home.heroSub: Full-cycle web studio: from landing pages to e-commerce. CRM integration, SEO promotion, technical support.
home.servicesSub: Full range of IT services for your business — from website creation to promotion
home.service1Text: Landing pages, business cards, corporate sites, and e-commerce — turnkey
home.service2Text: Implementation of AmoCRM, Bitrix24, Megaplan. Sales automation
home.service3Text: Site audit, optimization, TOP rankings in Yandex and Google, PPC advertising
home.service5Text: SMM, PPC advertising, design, content marketing, and other IT solutions
home.whySub: 10+ years of experience, 200+ projects, and an individual approach to each client
home.why1Text: From design to launch and promotion — all in one team
home.why2Text: We fix deadlines in the contract and take responsibility for every stage
home.why3Text: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, Python — using cutting-edge technologies
home.why4Text: Technical support and consultations after project launch
home.processSub: A transparent process from the first call to project launch
home.step1Text: Free consultation, task analysis, requirements specification
home.step2Text: Layout development, UI/UX approval, visual concept preparation
home.step3Text: Coding, programming, integrations, testing on all devices
home.step4Text: Deployment, analytics setup, SEO optimization, training
home.faq1Q: How much does website development cost?
home.faq1A: The cost depends on the type: landing page from 30,000 RUB, business card site from 40,000 RUB, e-commerce from 70,000 RUB. We'll calculate the exact price after discussing your project.
home.faq2A: Landing page — from 5 business days, business card — from 10 days, e-commerce — from 20 days. Timelines depend on project complexity.
home.faq3A: Yes, we provide 6 months of free technical support after website launch.
home.faq4Q: Do you work with clients from other cities?
home.faq4A: Yes, we work remotely with clients across Russia and internationally. Communication via messengers, video calls, and email.
home.faq5A: WordPress, Bitrix, Tilda, OpenCart — we choose the platform based on project requirements. We also develop with pure code for maximum performance.
home.ctaText: Leave a request, and we'll contact you within an hour. Consultation is free.

footer.desc: Full-cycle web studio. Creating websites, implementing CRM, promoting businesses online since 2014.

contacts.heroSub: Let's discuss your project, answer your questions, and offer the best solution. Consultation is free.
contacts.formSub: Describe your task, and we'll contact you shortly
contacts.consent: By clicking the button, you agree to our privacy policy

dev.heroSub: Landing pages, business cards, corporate sites, and e-commerce. Responsive design, modern stack, SEO optimization from day one.
dev.faq1A: It depends on the task: WordPress for blogs and business cards, OpenCart for stores, Bitrix for corporate sites. We also develop with pure code.
dev.faq2A: Yes, we provide design services separately. Layout in Figma with responsive variants.
dev.faq3A: Yes, we can write copy, select images, and fill the website with content as needed.
dev.ctaText: Tell us about your project — we'll suggest the best solution and calculate the cost.

crm.heroSub: We automate sales, set up funnels, integrate with telephony and messengers. AmoCRM, Bitrix24, Megaplan.
crm.amoText: Perfect for sales teams. Simple interface, powerful funnel, messenger integrations.
crm.bitrixText: Comprehensive solution: CRM + tasks + documents + telephony. For medium and large companies.
crm.megaplanText: Project and sales management. Suitable for project-based companies.
crm.what1: Process Audit — we analyze your current business processes
crm.what2: CRM Selection — we choose the optimal platform for your tasks
crm.what3: Funnel Setup — we create sales stages and automations
crm.what4: Integrations — we connect telephony, email, messengers, website
crm.what5: Training — we train your team to work in the system
crm.priceBasicDesc: Funnel setup, database import, basic integrations
crm.pricePremiumDesc: Full automation, custom development, dedicated manager
crm.faq1A: We'll conduct a free audit of your business processes and recommend the optimal platform.
crm.faq2A: Basic setup — from 5 business days. Full implementation with automation — from 2 weeks.
crm.faq3Q: Can you migrate data from another CRM?
crm.faq3A: Yes, we'll migrate data from any system while preserving history and contacts.
crm.ctaText: Tell us about your business — we'll select a CRM and calculate the implementation cost.

seo.heroSub: We bring websites to the TOP of Yandex and Google. Comprehensive optimization, content marketing, link building.
seo.basicDesc: Up to 10 pages, technical optimization, 30+ directory submissions
seo.advancedDesc: Up to 30 pages, SEO audit, content strategy, 60+ directories
seo.premiumDesc: Up to 50 pages, custom strategy, dedicated team, geo-targeting
seo.included1: Technical Audit — we find and fix site errors
seo.included2: Keyword Research — keyword selection for your niche
seo.included5: Content Marketing — creating expert articles and materials
seo.included6: Monthly Reports — transparent analytics of rankings and traffic
seo.step1Text: Complete technical and SEO audit of your website
seo.faq1A: First results — in 1-2 months. Stable TOP rankings — in 3-6 months, depending on competition.
seo.faq2A: We don't provide 100% guarantees as search algorithms constantly change. However, 90% of our clients reach TOP-10 for their main keywords.
seo.faq3Q: Can SEO be combined with PPC advertising?
seo.faq3A: Yes, and it's the optimal strategy: ads bring quick traffic, SEO — long-term. We set up both channels.
seo.ctaText: Order a free SEO audit of your website and discover the growth potential.

support.heroSub: System administration, website support, 1C maintenance. 24/7 monitoring, fast response.
support.sysadminText: Server, network, and workstation setup and maintenance. Monitoring and backups.
support.webText: CMS and plugin updates, content management. Bug fixing, speed optimization.
support.oneText: Setup, updates, and support for 1C software. User training.
support.included1: 24/7 Monitoring — we track availability and performance
support.priceStandardDesc: Up to 15 stations, server maintenance, priority support
support.faq1A: Yes, 90% of tasks are resolved remotely. We can visit on-site in Bryansk and the region when needed.
support.faq2Q: How quickly do you respond to incidents?
support.faq2A: Critical incidents — within 1 hour. Regular requests — within the business day.
support.faq3Q: Can I order a one-time service?
support.faq3A: Yes, we perform one-time work: server setup, security audit, data migration. Cost is calculated individually.
support.ctaText: Leave a request — we'll conduct a free audit of your IT infrastructure.

about.heroSub: We are a team of professionals with 10+ years of IT experience
about.missionText: We firmly believe that technology should be accessible and easy to use. Our goal is to create innovative solutions that help businesses maximize the effective use of available technologies.
about.principle1Text: Every project undergoes thorough testing before launch
about.principle2Text: Clients always know the current stage of their project
about.principle3Text: We take responsibility for results and meeting deadlines
about.principle4Text: We use modern technologies and follow the trends
about.partnersText: We are partners of leading platforms: Bitrix24, AmoCRM, Yandex, Tilda, FlexBe, Mango, Zadarma, TalkMe, WazzUp.
about.ctaText: Get in touch and tell us about your project.

privacy.section1Text: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users of the friendadmin.ru website (hereinafter — the Site), operated by FriendAdmin (hereinafter — the Operator).
privacy.section2Text: We may collect the following personal data voluntarily provided by you through forms on the Site:
privacy.section3Text: Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
privacy.section3List1: Contacting you to discuss a project or consultation
privacy.section3List3: Improving service quality and Site performance
privacy.section4Text: Your data is stored on secure servers and is not shared with third parties, except as required by Russian Federation law. We take necessary organizational and technical measures to protect data from unauthorized access.
privacy.section5Text: The Site uses cookies to collect analytics data (Google Analytics). Cookies help analyze Site usage and improve its performance. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.section6Text: You have the right to request information about your personal data, demand its modification or deletion. To do this, contact us by email.
privacy.section7Text: For questions about personal data processing, contact us: info@friendadmin.com
